def isLeapYear(year):
    return (year % 100 != 0 and year % 4 == 0) or year % 400 == 0
from calendar import isleap as isLeapYear

def isLeapYear(year):
    return year % 4 == 0 and year % 100 != 0 or year % 400 == 0

def isLeapYear(year):
    return year % 4 is 0 and year % 100 is not 0 or year % 400 == 0
isLeapYear = lambda y: (not y%4) * bool(y%100+(not y%400))

def isLeapYear(year):
    return (year%4 == 0) and not (year%100 == 0 and not year%400 == 0)
